email_text.subject: 文章索引错误
email_text.body:
An indexing error occurred while indexing the article "{$submissionTitle}" in the journal "{$contextName}".

This email was generated by Open Journal Systems' Lucene search plugin.
email_text.description: 此电子邮件模板用于通知期刊的技术支持，文章索引过程中发生了错误。

email_text.subject: Journal Indexing Error
email_text.body:
An indexing error occurred while indexing the journal "{$contextName}".

This email was generated by Open Journal Systems' Lucene search plugin.
email_text.description: 此电子邮件模板用于通知期刊的技术支持，期刊索引的过程中出现错误。

email_text.subject: 搜索服务的错误
email_text.body:
An error occurred while someone tried to search the installation "{$siteName}".

This email was generated by Open Journal Systems' Lucene search plugin.
email_text.description: 此电子邮件模板用于通知期刊的技术支持说明期刊试图访问Solr搜索服务出现了一个错误
